home.card: You will see some card like this
home.question: This is a question
home.blueCard: The blue one is your question or passage
home.redCard: The red one is the answer and score which indicates the confident level
home.input: put your question in the Input and Press the Button!
home.receive: you will receive the answer from the server after a while
home.based: This project is based on TensorFlow

home.card: 你会看到像这样的聊天卡片
home.question: 这是一个问题
home.blueCard: 蓝色卡片包含你的问题或者文章
home.redCard: 红色卡片代表答案以及跟问题相关程度的分数
home.input: 将你的问题或者文章输入到文本框，点击按钮!
home.receive: 不久后你就会收到来自服务端的答案和分数
home.based: 此项目基于 TensorFlow 开发
